definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain

sentences.english: Vedanta defines the real as being permanent and the unreal as being temporary.
sentences.chinese: 韦丹塔界定真正作为常任理事国和虚幻是暂时的。

sentences.english: It's the year of the shooter, and Half-Life and Unreal are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 这是一年的射手，和半条命和虚幻的介绍。

sentences.english: The"Madding Crowd"conceals the deep sense of illusion and absurdity.
sentences.chinese: 热闹喧嚣的场面下，蕴涵着浓重的虚幻感和荒诞意识。
“低能力者受制于其虚幻的优越感”。

sentences.english: In the guise of a fiction, the truth about himself is articulated.
sentences.chinese: 在虚幻的伪装下，他自我的真相得到了清晰的表达。

sentences.english: As the past has faded into misty memories, and the future remains a dream unrealized, seizing the present is most important.
sentences.chinese: 过去已成虚幻，未来尚是梦想，把握现在最重要。

sentences.english: Much dreaming and many words are meaningless.
sentences.chinese: 多梦和多言，其中多有虚幻。

sentences.english: The playwright cocooned himself in a world of pretence.
sentences.chinese: 这个剧作家与世隔绝，生活在一个虚幻的世界里。

sentences.english: Live in the virtual has no diffence to drug abuse.
sentences.chinese: 生活在虚幻中，和吸毒没有区别。

sentences.english: You will notice that everything is happening harmoniously without the illusion of control.
sentences.chinese: 你会发现任何事都无需虚幻控制而和谐的在发生。

sentences.english: A full fool feel like a flicker in a film.
sentences.chinese: 电影里面的一个虚幻影子似的整个傻冒。

sentences.english: Neuschwanstein Castle was born of pure fantasy – a beautiful, romantic composition of towers and walls in the perfect setting of mountains and lakes.
sentences.chinese: 新天鹅堡是建立虚幻的梦想和浪漫氛围下的城堡。

sentences.english: He seems to be living in a fool's paradise.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎生活在一个虚幻的乐境里。

sentences.english: It may still seem like all of this synchronization is performed with smoke and mirrors.
sentences.chinese: 整个同步执行过程仍可能好像是在变魔术一样虚幻。

sentences.english: The ideographic abstractness brings about the illusionary artistic world in novels.
sentences.chinese: 表意的抽象性导致小说艺术世界的虚幻化。

sentences.english: By the power of fancy, we may create an unreal world.
sentences.chinese: 借着想像力，我们可以创造一个虚幻不实的世界。

definition: unreal/illusory/imaginary/vague and with nothing in it
(of dreams, hopes etc) to vanish/to evaporate/(of a person) to become disillusioned/disillusionment
